Communist party delegations of Canada and Britain arrive
articles.content:
Communist party delegations of Canada and Britain arrive 
     Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of Canada (Marxist-Leninist) led by its national leader Sandra Bains and a delegation of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) led by its leader Christopher Coleman, spokesman of its central committee, arrived here today.
